Description: Reverend Kyle Shutt - Metallic Alpine Burst This Kyle Shutt signature is in excellent condition. Serial number: 28654 Weight: 7.56 lbs The Kyle Shutt Signature guitar features a sealed semi-hollow korina body with an asymmetrical center block that allows you to easily switch between clean and high-volume rock. It's stacked with distinctly-voiced Kyle Shutt signature Railhammer pickups, and features the first 4-knob control layout, delivering a broad range of tonal possibilities. It also has a 3-piece korina set neck with a comfortable medium oval profile and a 12" radius.
